Package edu.ntu.bto.control

Class OfficerControl

java.lang.Object
edu.ntu.bto.control.OfficerControl
public class OfficerControl extends Object
Control class for HDB Officer operations related to project registrations. OfficerControl allows an officer to register interest in handling a project and provides access to registration records for viewing and approval.
Author:
SC2002 Assignment Group

  • Constructor Details

    • OfficerControl

      public OfficerControl(List<Registration> registrations)
      Constructs a new OfficerControl with the given list of registrations.
      Parameters:
      registrations - The list of Registration records to manage.

  • Method Details

    • registerToProject

      public boolean registerToProject(HDBOfficer officer, Project project)
      Submits a registration request for an officer to handle a project. Before creating a new registration, it ensures the officer has not already registered for the project and is not handling another overlapping project.
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDBOfficer who wants to register as a project officer.
      project - The Project the officer wants to handle.
      Returns:
      true if the registration request was successfully created, or false if the officer is ineligible (already registered or time conflict).

    • getRegistrations

      public List<Registration> getRegistrations()
      Returns the list of all officer registrations.
      Returns:
      A list of Registration requests.

    • getRegistrationsByOfficer

      public List<Registration> getRegistrationsByOfficer(HDBOfficer officer)
      Retrieves all registration requests made by a specific officer.
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer whose registration requests to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of Registration associated with the given officer.

    • approveRegistration

      public void approveRegistration(Registration reg)
      Approves an officer's registration request. The registration status is set to APPROVED. (In practice, a manager would call this method.)
      Parameters:
      reg - The Registration to approve.

    • rejectRegistration

      public void rejectRegistration(Registration reg)
      Rejects an officer's registration request. The registration status is set to REJECTED.
      Parameters:
      reg - The Registration to reject.
